name: What's in the Dark ?
description:
A little spooky game for halloween

Little man left a pumpkin at the end of the haunted road and has to go and get it back, but molds are attacking it and are getting bigger by the minute!

WASD or ZQSD:  move

Space or S :  crouch

Made for Baba Game Jam and Spooky 2D Jam 22'

Theme : uncontrollable growth & What's Hiding in the Dark ?
Constraints:  Made in Solo, One Level, Halloween

music : dAmbiant on Freesound

character : https://penzilla.itch.io/hooded-protagonist

tileset : https://deepglowing.itch.io/dead-forest-pixel-art-asset
